availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles J. Spillman (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James and Permelia Spillman. Married to Mary Ann Robinson in Garrard County on November 21, 1851. Father of Sally Spillman, Medora Spillman, James Spillman, Charles Spillman, Permelia Spillman, and Mary Spillman. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850. Household owned eighteen enslaved persons in Garrard County in 1850. Farmer in Lancaster, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned thirty one enslaved persons in Lancaster in 1860.
